channel.title: BBMIP 11 or so
channel.description: On vacation this week and started work over the weekend on texturing the prodigy redos. Quick pass in dDo. Have a lot left to do before its done. ![](upload://v17bIhwEnF5ZNI7aMDfGPozy26i.jpeg) Also another project finished the modeling stage. Have to do another version for another section in the game. Anybody have a guess where this goes? ![](upload://wOjs3SgscK1Di7CiV1z7apVzb9U.jpeg)

item.title: BBMIP 11 or so
item.dc:creator: bkdale86
item.description:
Sixcentgeorge, You are welcome to your opinion, there are multiple constructive ways you could have approached how you expressed yourself. I’m doing this blog as a favor the to the forum followers, I do this for fun and as a hobby to relax, but when I have to wade through shit like you posted then posted again after people said something it makes me mad. So you can either follow the rules I put forth for blogs and express your opinion constructively or you can get banned and I stop posting cause either way is no skin off my teeth. So since you wanted to know why you didn’t get warned for some of your comments, it’s because I wasn’t in here for the last day or so and because I was working late. So you get your warning and a temp ban too. I’m also gonna stop posting for a while, maybe permanently, because it stops being fun when I have to do things when people can’t act like adults.

Read full topic

item.title: BBMIP 11 or so
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
@Keresh I edited my last post to at least (superficially) spell out the rules as I understand them. Someone’s free to link to it or Ctrl+c/+v to the next thread if they want to. Actually on that topic Brian, I encourage you to do just that (copy the text in my old post)…

Ignoring spelling out the rules for new people to the thread I have a question:
How long does it take you to retexture the models roughly? I know times are relative considering the size of the textures.

Just a grain of salt: Brian said the new textures will only be available in the retail release. Don’t hold me to that as plans could change or he chooses to elaborate more on the process.

I don’t mind that at all because I’m still definitly going to buy the retail version. This remake is incredible, and the devs really deserve money for what they’ve made.

item.title: BBMIP 11 or so
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
@Brian you can use this as a template for your next thread to post the ground rules if you wish.

Since people seem to have a difficult time understanding the ground rules laid out in the first thread:

The ground rules are only models/textures displayed here.

[b][u][i]Brian (bkdale) WILL NOT answer questions about any other content. Including but not limited to: Xen, level changes, what’s going on internally with the devs, his personal life, hospitalization, etc. Unless he explicitly states he wishes to answer such questions, you will not get an answer. The only questions that are acceptable and that he will answer are ones pertaining to the current project, I.E. the textures and models used inside of the pictures.

He has a low tolerance for this. FAILURE TO FOLLOW THESE SIMPLE RULES WILL RESULT IN THREAD CLOSURE AND POSSIBLE TERMINATION OF PUBLIC SHARING BY THE DEVELOPER AT THEIR CHOICE. THIS IS NON-NEGOTIABLE. AS INDICATED BELOW:[/SIZE][/i][/u][/b]

bkdale86:

Well if you have read any of the other threads you should know that I am only going to answer on topic questions ie model/texture related questions about the particular thread. Go off again and I’ll just lock and not post for awhile. Or just stop all together.

As you can see, if you don’t follow the rules, you ruin it for everyone.[/SIZE]

TL;DR:

  • Be respectful and constructive with your criticisms. If you’re not sure, read it to yourself and ask yourself “Would I want to answer this myself?,” if your answer’s no, re-word it. Saying “I don’t like X” and not elaborating will result in someone confusing you for the common troll (if you act like a jerk).

  • Don’t be a jerk. This is straight forward, don’t go on a tirade about something stupid. You can get banned or get slapped with an infarction for that in extreme cases.

  • If you want to ask questions that are only superficially pertaining to the topic such as this or this they’re okay, but don’t expect an answer. He does this at his own leisure.

The mods or devs can add to or remove from this list at their leisure.

Read full topic

item.title: BBMIP 11 or so
item.dc:creator: bkdale86
item.description:
sourcegamer101:

do you guys go through a concept art phase for these model revisions or do you just wing it?

I wing it. But it is kinda concepted. I don’t draw it out but I do try different combinations of things until I find something I like or I usually combine a bunch of real world objects into my version. Some times its done to match models done by orther guys. Just all depends.

Chickenprotector:

Just a grain of salt: Brian said the new textures will only be available in the retail release. Don’t hold me to that as plans could change or he chooses to elaborate more on the process.

Yeah that is the current plan.

Read full topic

item.title: BBMIP 11 or so
item.dc:creator: bkdale86
item.description:
MysticJ:

Looks great, with perhaps one tiny issue: it is all too apparent that the gages etc. are duplicated. It would be better if the values shown by the different gages could differ. If it’s animated, then please disregard this comment.

What is the point of a GENERIC console that can be used anywhere if it has specific labels? Most of the above is from UV sharing, its only split to help the AO or to break up the looks so all the dials or switches aren’t repeated all over. Also do you know how big a texture has to be to have readable dials etc? That one there is 2048 (working copy). That is impractical for in game when it will have 3-6 different skins. Do you know how animated textures work in source? Each frame is the full resolution of the texture plus any alpha channel stuff. So to animate that texture at full rez would be like a 50 meg file for 3 number changes. All my animated textures are small so the size isn’t crazy see the wall screens in AM/UC. Scrolling textures work different. The original texture was only 512. This will be 1024 when finished. Anyway…
Finished up the ion console for UC. The wires were finally finished and added.

1573×1071 181 KB

Then smoke/burn effects added.
1488×1098 154 KB

Read full topic

MysticJ:

Looks great, with perhaps one tiny issue: it is all too apparent that the gages etc. are duplicated. It would be better if the values shown by the different gages could differ. If it’s animated, then please disregard this comment.
